CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Enterprises relative to Luminara Solutions?
SRP.A: Starburst Enterprises is {below} Luminara Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oracle Systems relative to Echo Dynamics?
SRP.A: Oracle Systems is {above} Echo Dynamics in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oracle Systems relative to Luminara Solutions?
SRP.A: Oracle Systems is {below} Luminara Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total r&d investment?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aether Corp}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total r&d investment?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Group}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Dynamics's minimum R&D Investment in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Dynamics's minimum R&D Investment is in {1982}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Nova Industries's maximum R&D Investment in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Nova Industries's maximum R&D Investment is in {1980}.

NC.Q: Between 1966 and 1978, did the total R&D Investment experience a larger or smaller change than between 1971 and 1983?
NC.A: The change in total r&d investment between 1966 and 1978 was {smaller} than between 1971 and 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1981, did the total R&D Investment experience a larger or smaller change than between 1966 and 1986?
NC.A: The change in total r&d investment between 1978 and 1981 was {smaller} than between 1966 and 1986.

NC.Q: Was the total R&D Investment in 1970 higher or lower than in 1981?
NC.A: The total r&d investment in 1970 was {lower} than in 1981.

NC.Q: Was the total R&D Investment in 1967 higher or lower than in 1973?
NC.A: The total r&d investment in 1967 was {lower} than in 1973.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Aether Corp} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Oracle Systems and Crimson Group first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Oracle Systems and Crimson Group first exchanged leading positions in {1965}.
